game.name: Wild Horse Racing
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Wild Horse Racing is a fast-paced arcade horse racing game where timing is everything! Master control patterns from easy to godlike difficulty, leap over big jumps, and race through vibrant tracks around the world. Climb the leagues, manage your horse, and gallop from bronze to gold!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wild Horse Racing is a fast-paced arcade horse racing game where timing is everything! Master control patterns from easy to godlike difficulty, leap over big jumps, and race through vibrant tracks around the world. Climb the leagues, manage your horse, and gallop from bronze to gold!
